author: amagnani
body:
This is a first trial to implement a more realistic cavern description in the 2017 CMS geometry. This implementation will be used for the simulation of neutron background in the muon system. 
The cavern geometry was updated with the following elements imported from fluka v3.0.0.0:
- Electronics racks
- HF risers
- YB feet
- realistic implementation of the cavern floor
- elliptical cavern shape
- cavern shaft 
@ianna fixed major overlaps. 
Automatically ported from CMSSW_9_0_X #17674 (original by @amagnani).
Please wait for a new IB (12 to 24H) before requesting to test this PR.
title: 2017 Dev Scenario with Detailed Cavern
